Global Variable# BNNSActivationFunctionErf

iOS 16.4+iPadOS 16.4+Mac Catalyst 16.4+macOS 13.3+tvOS 16.4+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 9.4+

```
var BNNSActivationFunctionErf: BNNSActivationFunction { get }
```
